verbose_text: Remarkably, we find that the only essential function for the thioredoxin peroxidase activity of the Prx Tpx1 (hPrx1/2) in resistance to H 2 O 2 is to inhibit a conserved thioredoxin family protein Txl1 (hTxnl1 / TRP32).
evidence: peroxidase activity of the Prx Tpx1(hPrx1/2) in resistance to H 2 O 2  is to inhibit a conserved thioredoxin
